nodes.text: The Kanduh were an ancient sentient species from the planet Kaldahan.
According to legend, the Kanduh had amassed great quantities of wealth before wiping themselves out in a terrible war thousands of years before the rise of the Galactic Empire.

The Kanduh were created by Jean Balczesak and Olivier Vatine for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario "Trois mini scénarios: Le Trésor oublié" which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 66.
